content:
Dawidowicz family

1 Elias DAWIDOWICZ                   1781 - before 1833 (Dawid)
 + Henny                             1785-87 (Pinkus)
       married Aug 18, 1805 Krakow
  2o Sara Golde DAWIDOWICZ           Mar 13, 1807 Krakow
    * Moyzesz KALMUS                 Nov 25, 1810 #64 - after 1880
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Hane DAWIDOWICZ                 1813 #57
    * Leybel FRAGER                  ?1811 #88a
     3o Laia FEUER                   1841 #40
     3x Eliasz Baruch FRAGER         May 10, 1843 #501
  2o Rikel DAWIDOWICZ                1811-14
    * Wolf ELTERS                    1809 - 1851 #212
          married Oct 31, 1833 #100
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Rebeka DAWIDOWICZ               1820 #77 - after 1890
    * Markus Leibel FRONT            1815 - Dec 14, 1876 #379
          married Apr 18, 1853 #53
     3o Ruda (Roza) FRONT            Nov 30, 1853 #531
       * Wolf KLIBANOW               May 15, 1855 Wolatycza
             married Aug 10, 1890 #92
        4x Markus Leib KLIBANOW      Jan 14, 1882 #14
        4x Majer KLIBANOW            May 18, 1883 #401 - after 1940
       ?? + Ruchel /Resi GROSSMAN/LANDAU

       ??       banns 1914 #64,  married Aug 7, 1914,  divorced Jun 17, 1922 Krakow
        4x son KLIBANOW              Jun 3, 1884 - Jun 10, 1884 #255
        4o Reizel KLIBANOW           Oct 16, 1885 #697
          * Anschel HERSTEIN         Aug 15, 1880 #500 - after 1941
                banns 1907 #236

                married Nov 17, 1907 #185
           5x Marceli WASSERMANN     Nov 18, 1910 #787
        4o Chaja KLIBANOW            Feb 25, 1887 #111 - after 1940

        4o Lea KLIBANOW              Nov 11, 1894 #767
        4x Izak KLIBANOW             Sep 8, 1897 #583
     3o Henne FRONT                  Mar 14, 1856 #210
       * Eljakim FISCHER             Nowa Wies pow. Biala
             married Jan 22, 1893 #57
        4x Szymon FISCHER            Jun 7, 1898 #388
     3x Hirsch Eliasz FRONT          May 27, 1858 #1402
       + Ruchel THIEBERGER           1867 Wadowice
             married Dec 26/31, 1882 #53 Wadowice
        4o Keila FRONT               Nov 22, 1884 #699
        4x Markus Leib FRONT         May 25, 1886 #312
        4o Hena FRONT                Jul 13, 1888 #415
        4o Chana FRONT               Oct 3, 1889 #652
        4o Regina FRONT              Sep 1, 1891 #627
        4x Zygmunt FRONT             Nov 4, 1893 #694
        4x Salomon FRONT             Aug 22, 1895 #560
        4o Salomea FRONT             May 2, 1897 #300
        4x Pinkus FRONT              Dec 15, 1898 #900
     3o Helena FRONT                 1860/61 Krakow
       * unknown GOLDSTEIN           - before 1890

  2o Schewa DAWIDOWICZ               1823 #163
